description: Multiple streamers performing together to get gifts/votes.

examples.translation: 10 million viewers in one night, borderline risky group stream

examples.chinese: 直播新风口,团播何以成年轻人新宠
examples.translation: New trend in live streaming, why group stream is new favorite of young people

examples.chinese: 单场千万打赏,打PK,输了奖金给对方吗？
examples.translation: Ten million tips in single session, PK battle, does loser give prize money to winner?
